Sun, 03 Dec 2023 05:57:27 +0000 A police spokesperson said they located the offender a short distance from the scene and a 41-year-old male was charged with shoplifting. Photo / Bevan Conley
Te Whatu Ora granted urgent injunction, police complaint filed over mass privacy breach of Covid vaccination data by staff member https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/te-whatu-ora-granted-urgent-injunction-police-complaint-filed-over-mass-privacy-breach-of-covid-19-vaccination-data-作者：前工作人员/EUKC3NHC6FAOVL2YJSE4GUR6BU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/te-whatu-ora-granted-urgent-injunction-police-complaint-filed-over-mass-privacy-breach-of-covid-19-vaccination-data-作者：前工作人员/EUKC3NHC6FAOVL2YJSE4GUR6BU/ Lincoln TanTe Whatu Ora says it is doing 'everything [it] can' to respond to the incident. Photo / Getty Images
